mapper.select: SELECT p.FG_PRODUCT_ID AS productId, p.FG_PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, p.FG_CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, p.FG_PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, p.FG_PRODUCT_STOCK AS productStock, p.FG_PRODUCT_EXP_DATE AS productExpDate, p.FG_PRODUCT_TIME AS productTime, p.FG_PRODUCT_CONTENT AS productContent FROM FG_PRODUCT p, FG_PRODUCT_FILE pf WHERE p.FG_PRODUCT_ID = pf.FG_PRODUCT_ID AND p.FG_PRODUCT_STATUS = '판매중';
